content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line (around position 8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest for copper plates at position (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at position (6.5, 13.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine-1 at position (8.5, 13.5) that produces automation science packs
- Burner inserter at position (10.5, 13.5) that moves products to output chest
- Output chest at position (11.5, 13.5)

### Power Generation System (around position -4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5, 27.5) providing water
- Boiler at position (-4.5, 16.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at position (-4.5, 12.5) generating electricity
- Connected pipe network carrying water and steam
- Electricity network powering assembling machines and labs

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup (around position -28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0, -61.0)
- Output chest at position (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at position (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at position (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Coal Mining Setup (around position 41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at position (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at position (41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check chest inventory contents using get_inventory() before extracting

### Resource shortage errors in assembling machine
- Ensure all required ingredients (copper plates and iron gear wheels) are available before starting production
- Monitor assembling machine inventory to maintain continuous production

### Power system issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power generation
- Monitor steam and water levels in the pipe network

### Out of fuel errors in mining drills
- Regularly check and refuel burner mining drills
- Set up automated fuel delivery system using inserters

### Entity status monitoring
- Check entity status before performing operations
- Handle different entity states (WORKING, NO_FUEL, ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE) appropriately
